mann nheneeka vßleek/ ja taß nhe buhß/ O Kungs/ taws Prahtz.
6. Par wiſẜahm Leetham tam Puhkam/ ar taweem Engeļeem
pretti ſtahwi :/: Ka taß Nackty nhe darra/ kahdu leelu Vgguns=
Ghräku: Mannu Nabbadſibu pajembt/ ko Tu mann eſẜi dehwis/
vnd man leelà kaunà zellt/ ar karrſtu Vggunskurry.
7. O Kungs Deews no=ghrud to ſemmeh/ kad wings ghribb py
mums nahkt :/: paliedſi ka mehß äſẜam mohdrighi/ Rietohß aggre
zellteeß: Tha arridſan no Kappas/ ta gir taß labbakais Kambariets/
ißtaiſẜiti ar krahſẜneem Dahwaneem/ paſtarà deenà mums darri
jaukus/ Amen.
XXXII.
Der Reyſenden Lied.
Jn GOttes Nahmen fahren wir.
MEhß eetam ar Deewu Thäwu/
Winja Schälaſtibu mehß luhdſam/
Laid Wings mums ſchodeen pa=ghlahba/
168 Der Reyſenden Lied.
Laid Wings mums ſchodeen pa=ghlahba/
Muhßu Dwehſẜel vnd Meeſẜu paſẜarrgha/
Ock Deews abſchälojeeß!
2. CHriſtus eſẜi tu muhſẜo Waddons/
Palleetz py mums allaſch vs Zeļļu/
Nowehrß no mums tha wälla willtu/
Vnd wiß kaß prett tawu Wahrdu gir/
Ock Deews abſchälojeeß!
3. Ꞩwähtais Gharrs mums paſẜarrghi/
Ar taweem daſchadeemdaſchadeein Dahwaneem/
Ee=drohẜcheni mums wiſẜahs Bähdahß/
Vnd wedd mums liexmus Mahjahß/
Ock Deews abſchälojeeß!
Collecten.
Gemeine Collecte.
O Wiſẜewalldiegs Deews/ muhſchiegs Tähws/
katters tu eſẜi weens Paglabbotais wiſẜo to/
kattri vs töw zerreh/ bes tawas ſchälaſtibas
nhe warr nhe weens/ neds ſpeh ko darriet/ dohd
mums tawu ſchälaſtibu baggatige/ ka mehß zaur tawu
ẜwähtu Eedoſchanu dohmayam kas labb gir/ vnd zaur
tawu Palligu arridſan pabeidſam/ zaur JEſum CHriſtum
tawu mylu Dählu muhſẜu Kunghu/ katters ar töw/
vnd to ẜwähtu Gharru dſiewo vnd wallda weens pattees
Deews allaſchien vnd muhſchige/ Amen.
Collecten. 169
Ein ander.
O Wiſẜewalldiegs Deews/ muhſchiegs Tähws/ no
kattru mehß allaſchien wiſẜu labbumu pahreyoht
dabbuyam/ vnnd ickdeenas no wiſẜu Nhelaim ſchehlige
pagglabohti tohpam. Mehß luhdſam töw no Ꞩirrdes
dibben/ dohd mums ka zaur tawu Gharru ſcho wiſẜu ar
ſtippru Ꞩirrdi vnd patteeſẜu Titzibu mehß attſieſtam/ ka
mehß tawu leelu lehnibu vnd ſchälaſtibu/ ſcheitan vnd
turr muhſchige patteitzam vnd ẜlaweyam/ zaur JEſum
CHriſtum/
&c
Vor gemeine Noht.
O Wiſẜewalldiegs Kungs/ ſchehliegs Tähs/ kattram
to nabbago Ghrehzeeneeko Nahwe nhe patiek/ vñ
nhe leetz tohß arridſan labpraht paſuſt/ bett ghribbi ka tee
attghreeſchahß vnd dſiewo: Mehß luhdſam töw no
Ꞩirds dibben/ tu ghribbätu to nopellnitu Ꞩohdu muhſẜo
Ghräko ſchehlige no mums nowehrſt/ vnd mums joproyam
tawu ſchälaſtibu doht/ ka mehß weenu Labbaku dſiewoſchanu
eeẜahkt warram: Zaur JEſum CHriſtum tawu
myļu Dählu muhſẜu Kunghu/ katters ar töwtow vnd to
ẜwähtu Gharru dſiewo vnd wallda weens pattees Deews
allaſchien vnd muhſchige/ Amen.
Vor die gemeine Chriſtenheit.
O Wiſẜewalldiegs Deews/ ſchehliegs Tähws/ katters
tu zaur tawu ẜwähtu Gharru to wiſẜu Chriſtitu
Draudſibu ẜwehti vnd walldi/ Packlauſẜi muhſẜu Luhkſchanu/
170 Collecten.
vnd dohd ſchehlige/ ka ta ar wiſẜeem ẜaweem Lozekļeem
eekſchan ſkieſtu Titzibu zaur tawu ſchälaſtibu töw
kallpo/ zaur JEſum CHriſtum/
&c
Eine gemeine Collect.
O Wiſẜewalldiegs Deews/ ſchehliegs Tähws/ katters tu
to behdigo Nopuſchanu nhe nitzini/ vnd to noſkummuſcho
Ļauſcho ghaidiſchanu nhe leeds/ Vsluhko vs
muhſẜu Luhkſchanu/ kattru mehß töw muhſẜahß bähdahß
preekſch näſẜam/ vnd paklauſẜi mums ſchehlige/ ka wiß kas
mums no Wällu vnd Zillwäkeem prettie ſtahw/ kaunà
tohp/ vnd pehtz tawu Prahtu tahß ſchälaſtibas ißdälldäti/
ka mehß no wiſẜu kahrdenaſchanu ißpeſtiti/ töw eekſchã
tawas Draudſibas patteitzam vnd töw allaſchien ẜlaweyam/
zaur JEſum CHriſtum/
&c
Für Friede.
O Wiſẜewalldiegs Deews/ muhſchiegs Tähws/ weens
Konings tahß ghohdibas/ vnd Radditais Debbes
vnd Semmes/ zaur kattra Gharru wiſẜas leetas wallditas/
zaur kattra ißredſeſchanu wiſẜas leetas ißttaiſẜietas
tohp/ katters tu eſẜi weens Deews tha Meera/ no kattru
wiſẜa Weenaidiba py mums nahk: Mehß luhdſam töw/
tu ghribbätu mums muhſẜus Ghräkus peedoht/ vnd ar
tawu Deewigu Meeru vnd Weenaidibu apdahwenaht/
ka mehß biedameeß vnd trieſẜädami tawam Wahrdam
kallpoyam/ vnd tu allaſchien no mums warrätu teicktz
tapt/ zaur JEſum CHriſtum/
Collecten. 171
Eine andere Collect für Friede.
O Deews tu Eeſtaditais tha Meera/ vnd Myļotais
tahß Myläſtibas/ kas töw atſieſt tas dſiewo/ kas
töw kallpo tas wallda: Pagglabbo tawus Ļaudis/ paſẜarrgi
tohß par wiſẜu vseeſchanu ẜweſſcho Tauto/ ka
mums to Waideneeko dehļ nhe wayaga bytees/ kattri
mehß ẜöw vs tawu ghellbeſchanu paļauyamees/ zaur
JEſum CHriſtum/
Noch eine andere für Friede.
O Wiſẜewallditais/ muhſchiegs Deews/ ſchehliegs
Tähws/ no kattru wiſẜa ẜwähta eegribbeſchana/ wiß
labbs Paddohms/ vnd labbi darrbi attnahk/ dohd taweems
Kallpeems to Meeru/ kattru ta Paſẜaule nhe ſpeh
doht/ ka muhſẜas Ꞩirrdes vs tawu Wahrdu pahdohdahß/
vnd mehß tick illge ka mehß dſiewoyam/ kad wiſẜa
breeßmiba to Tauto dehļ attkahpuſẜi gir/ zaur tawu Paſẜarrgaſchanu
preezigi vnd kluſẜi warram buht: Zaur
JEſum CHriſtum/
ut ſuprà
Wieder die Peſtilentz.
O Wiſẜewallditais/ muhſchiegs Deews/ ſchehliegs
Tähws/ tu ſinni kada wahja nabbaga leeta mehß
äſẜam/ Nhe attmaxa mums ka mehß ar muhſẜu wahju
Titzibu vnd leelu Nhepatteitzibu par tawu ẜwehtu Wahrdu
äſẜam nopellniyuſchi/ darri tu mums labbus/ vnd ſtipprini
muhſẜu Titzibu/ vnd abſchäloyees par mums/ ẜohdi
muhſẜus Ghräkus ſchälodams/ vnnd jemm no mums
172 Collecten.
ſchehlige to Riext to Mehŗatrummo/ ka taws nabbags
Pullzings nhe tohp ißkaiſẜietz/ vnd ka tawi Prettibneeki
nhe preezayahß par muhſẜu wahju Titzibu/ vnd tapehtz
tawu Wahrdu vnd Ꞩohdibu neewa/ To dohd mums tu
wiſẜo ſchehliegs Tähws/ zaur JEſum Chriſtum tawu myļu
Dählu muhſẜu Kunghu/ katters ar töw vnd to ẜwähtu
Gharru weens pattees Deews dſiewo vnd wallda allaſchien
vnd muhſchige/ Amen.
Für die Früchte der Erden.
O Wiſẜewalldiegs Kungs Deews/ däbbäſẜo Tähws/
katters tu zaur tawu muhſchigu Wahrdu wiſẜas
leetas raddiyis eſẜi/ ſwehti vnde vßturri. Mehß luhdſam
töw/ ka tu tawu muhſchigu Wahrdu/ muhſẜu Kunghu
JEſum CHriſtum/ mums gribbätu mahziet paſiet/ vnd
eekſchan muhſẜam Ꞩirrdehm eeſtattieth/ zaur kattru
mehß pehtz tawas ſchälaſtibas zeenige warram dabbuit/
tawu Ꞩwähtumu par wiſẜu Ꞩähklu wirſẜon Semmes/
vnd kaß mums wiß wayaga gir py Meeſẜas vßturreſchanas/
vnnd tahdas Dahwanas tawam Deewiſkam
Wahrdam par Ꞩlawu/ vnd muhſẜam Tuwakam par
labbu jembt/ zaur JEſum CHriſtum/
Für alle Weltliche Obrigkeit.
O Wiſẜewalldiegs Deews vnd ſchehliegs Tähws/
eekſchan kattra Rohkam wiſẜo Zillwäko ſpähx
vnd Walldiſchana/ no töw eeſtadita/ vnd eelickta par
Ꞩohdu to ļauno vnd par glabboſchanu to labbo ĻauſcholabboĻauſcho/
Collecten. 173
Eekſchan kattra Rohkam arridſan gir wiſẜa Teeſẜa tahß
Semmes/ Mehß luhdſam töw/ vßluhko ſchehlige vs
muhſẜu zeenigu Leelkungu vnd Koningu/ vnd vs wiſẜeems
Kungeems/ vnd vs wiſẜeems Rahtes vnd Runnaskungeems
ſchahß Semmes (Pilis) vnd vs wiſẜeem
ghodigeem Wirſẜeneekeem: Ka tee to paſẜauligu Sohbänu/
kattru tu teem eſẜi pawehleyis/ pehtz tawu Prahtu
vnd pawehleſchanu näſẜa/ Abghaißmo vnd vßturri tohß
py tawu Deewigu Wahrdu/ dohd teems/ myļais Kungs/
ghuddribu vnd Ꞩappraſchanu/ vnd meerigu Walldiſchanu/
ka tee ẜawus Ļaudis eekſchan Meeru/ Weenaidibu
vnd labbu ẜadderreſchanu glabboht vnd walldiet warr.
Dohd teem/ o Kungs muhſẜas Peſtiſchanas/ illge dſiewoht/
ka mehß appackſchan wiņjo Wallſtibas tawu deewigu
Wahrdu/ lieds ar teem ẜwehtiet vnnd ẜlaweht
warram/ zaur JEſum CHriſtum/
Wieder die Anfechtung.
O Wiſẜewalldiegs Deews/ muhſchiegs Tähs/ weens
Eepreezetais to Noſkummuſcho/ weens ſpähx to
Wahyo/ Leetz preekſchan tawu Waighu nahkt to Luhkſchanu
wiſẜo to/ kattri eekſchan bähdeem vnd kahrdenaſchanas
töw peeluhds vnd ẜautz/ ka ick=kattris nomaniet
vnd py ẜöw attrohd tawu Palligu vnd klaht ſtahweſchanu
bähdalaikà/ zaur JEſum CHriſtum/
Für die Diener Göttlichs Worts.
O Wiſẜewalldiegs ſchehliegs Deews/ vñ Tähws muhſẜa
Kungha JEſu CHriſti/ katters tu mums ſtippre
pawehleyis eſẜi/ ka mums töw buhß luhkt par Darrbenekeem
174 Collecten.
tawà Druwà/ tas gir/ par labbeems Mahzetayeem
tawa Wahrda: Mehß luhdſam tawu beßdibbenigu
ſchälaſtibu/ Tu ghribbätu mums labbus Mahzetayus
vnd Kallpus tawa Deewiga Wahrda ẜuhtiet/ vnd
teem paſſcheem tawu ẜwähtu Wahrdu eekſchan Ꞩirrds
vnd Muttes eedoht/ ka tee tawu pawehleſchanu peetitzigepawehleſchanupeetitzige
vnd pehtz tawu Prahtu darra/ vnd nheneeka mahza kas
prettie tawu Wahrdu buht warr/ ka mehß zaur tawu
muhſchigu ẜwähtu Wahrdu pamahziti/ baŗŗohti/ eepreezenati
vnd eeſtipprenati tohpam/ vnd darram kas töw
patiek vnd mums labb warr buht/ zaur JEſum CHriſtum
tawu myļu Dählu muhſẜu Kunghu/ katters ar töw
vnd to ẜwähtu Gharru weens pattees Deews dſiewo
vnd wallda allaſchien vnd muhſchige/ Amen.
Ein Gebet in Peſtilentz=zeiten.
O Muhſchiegs/ wiſẜewalldiegs Deews/ däbbäſẜo
Tähws/ kapehtz eſẜi tu tick barrgs vnd dußmiegs vß
mums/ vnd vs tahm Ahweem tawas ghannibas.
Ock Kungs muhſẜi Noſegummi gir to ghann nopellniyuſchi/
ka tu mums tick ghauſche ſchaut/ Aiſto muhſẜa
Nheklauſẜiba gir jo leela/ ar kattru mehß prettie töw ghräkoyuſchi
äſẜam.
Muhſẜus Noſegummus leezees tu preekſchan töw/
muhſẜus nheſiņņus Ghräkus eekſchan ghaißmas preekſchan
tawu Waighu.
Tapehtz iß=ẜackam mehß töw muhſẜus Ghräkus/
vnd nhe ẜlepyam töw muhſẜus Noſegummus.
Collecten. 175
Bett attghadayees Kungs tawas ſchälaſtibas/ vñ tawas
lehnibas/ kattra no Eeẜakum̃u pirms paſẜaules biyuſẜi gir.
Aiſto tu eſẜi jo ar ſkaidreems Wahrdeems ſwehredams
ẜatziyis:
Tick teeſcham ka es dſiewoyo/ nhe pattiek mann ta
Nahwe ta nabbaga Ghrehzeneeka: Bett ka tas attſtahjahs
vnd dſiewo.
Eſẜi mums ſchehliegs Deews/ eſẜi mums ſchehliegs:
Aiſto vs töw pallaiſchahß ẜöw muhſẜa Dwehſẜele/ vnd appackſchan
to ähnu tawo Spahrno gir mums Paglabhpſchana/
teekams ta Nhelaime pahreet.
Steidſees Deews mums peſtiet/ Kungs nahtz nahkdams
mums palliedſeht.
Kungs katters tu zittu reis arridſan eſẜi wiſẜu tawu
Dußmibu nohſt mettis/ vnd ẜöw ghreeſees no to bahrſẜibu
ẜawas Dußmibas/ EepreeziniEeepreezini mums/ Deews
muhſẜo Peſtitais/ vnd attlaidees no tawas Nheſchälaſtibas
par mums.
Kungs parrahdi mums tawu ſchälaſtibu/ vnd palliedſi
mums.
Attpeſti mums/ muhſẜas Ꞩeewas/ muhſẜus Bährnus
vnd Ꞩaim/ muhſẜus Kaimiņņus vnd Draugus/ no
wiſẜu ļaunu/ vnd to nicknu Ꞩährgu vnd Nheweſẜelibu.
Nhe leetz mums ißbietees par teems Schauſſchaleems
kattri nackties pahreet/ par tahms bulltahms/ kattri
Deenà ſkaidra/ par to Ꞩährgu kattra Deenas widdu
ẜamaita.
176 Collecten.
Nhe leetz mums kadu laun notickt/ neds kahdai Ꞩährgai
py muhſẜam buhdam peeſtahtees. Pawehl tawam
Engeļam/ ka tas mums paſẜarrga vs wiſẜu muhſẜu zeļļu.
Pilldini mums ſchehlige ar Weſẜelibu/ vnnd rahdi
mums tawu Peſtiſchanu.
Par nicknu peepehſchu Nahw paſẜarrgi mums mieļais
Deews vnd Kungs.
Eeſiemo ar tawu Ꞩirrdsmieliga Dähla muhſẜa
Kungha JEſu Chriſti Aſẜini muhſẜas Ꞩirrdes/ ka tas
Mehrdehtais Engels mums zätzeen eet.
Eeſiemo muhſẜas Dwehſẜeles ar to Spähku ẜawa
wißſwähta Kruſta/ vnd Nahw/ ka mums nhekada Nhelaimiba
nhenoteek.
Zaur tawa Dähla Kruſtu vnd Nahwu/ palliedſi
mums mieļais Kungs vnd Deews.
Ꞩacki vs to Ꞩamaitatayu/ jaw ghann gir/ Attrau
ẜawu Rohku.
Bett ja mums tad pehtz tawu labbu prahtu no
ſchennenes eet buhß/ vnd py muhſẜeem Tähweem ſackrahteem
tapt/ Tad laid tas palleek muhſẜo pehdeis Wahrds/
ka mehs ẜackam: Eekſchan tawu Rohku pawehļam
mehs muhſẜu Dwehſẜel/ Tu eſẜi mums attpeſtiyis/ Kungs
tu peetitziegs Deews.
Packlauſẜi mums mieļais Kungs vnd Deews/ aiſto
tu eſẜi jo muhſẜo Tähws.
Abſchäloyees töw par mums/ aiſto tu eſẜi jo muhſẜo
Eepreezetais vnd Palliegs eekſchan bähdam.
Collecten. 177
Paſẜarrgi mums/ aiſto tu eſẜi jo weens Wißſpähziegs
Deews/ nhe ſtumm mums wiſchſkim nohſt/ aiſto tu eſẜi jo
ſchähliegs/ rahms vnd no leelas lehnibas.
Eepreezini ar tawu ẜwähtu Gharru wiſẜus noſkummuſchus
Ꞩirrdes/ dſeedini wiſẜus Nheweſẜeļus/ jemm tawà
ghlabboſchanà/ kattri tohß no Ꞩirrds ẜarrga/ ghauſſini
vnd ẜahtini wiſẜus labbus Ļaudis/ kattri par teems
ghada/ vnd ẜawas ſchähligas Rohkas attwerr.
Tad ghribbam mehs töw teickt/ tick illge ka mehs
dſiewoyam/ vnnd tawu leelu lehnibu ſlaweht/ tick illge
mehs ſcheitan äſẜam/ vnd töw muhſchige dſeedaht/ Hallelujah/
Hallelujah/ Amen.
Pſalmen Davids/ ſo an Sontagen vnd
Wercktagen in der Kirchen zu Riga gebrau-
chet oder geſungen werden.
Der erſte Pſalm.
LAbb tam/ kas nhe ſtaigha eekſchan to Beßdeewiego Runnaß/
neds minn vs to Zeļļu to Ghrezeneeko/ neds ẜehſch kur tee
Mehditayi ẜehſch.
2. Bett gribbahs to Baußlu tha Kunga/ vnd runna no ẜawu
Baußlu deenas vnd nacktis.
3. Tas gir ka kahds kohx dehſtietz py teems Vhdens Vppeem/
katters ẜawus Augļus näß ẜawà laikà/ vnd winya Lappas nhe ẜawieſt/
vnd ko darridams tas ißdohdas.
4. Bett tha nhe gir tee Beßdeewigi/ bett ka Pällus/ kattrus tas
Wehſch ißpuhſch.
5. Tapehtz nhe palleek tee Beßdeewigi Ꞩohdà/ neds tee Ghrezeneeki
eekſchan to Taißno Pullku.
6. Aiſto taß Kungs paſieſt to zeļļu to Taißno/ bett to Beßdewigo
zellſch ißniext.
178 Pſalmen Davids.
Ghods gir tam Tähwam/ vnd tam Dählam/ vnd tam Ꞩwähtam
Gharram/ ka no Eeẜakumu gir biyis/ vnd palleek muhſcho muhſcham/
Amen.
Der ander Pſalm.
KApehtz tracko tee Paggani/ vnd tee Ļaudis runna tick wellte?
2. Tee Koninyi eekſchan Semmes ſpreeſchahß/ vnd tee
Kunghi ẜarunnayahß kohpa/ prettie to Kunghu vnd ẜawu
Ꞩwaidietu?
3. Laideeta mums ẜarauſtiet winyo Ꞩaiteß/ vnd no mums meſt
winyo Wirrwes.
4. Bett kas Debbeſẜies dſiewo/ ẜmeyahß to/ vnd tas Kungs
mehdi tohß.
5. Wings weenreis ar teem runnahß ẜahwoß dußmohß/ vnd ar
ẜawu Barrgu wings tohß beedinahs.
6. Bett es äßmu mannu Koninyu ee=zehliß/ vs mannu ẜwähtu
Kallnu Zion.
7. Es ghribbu no tahdu weenu Wies mahziet/ ka tas Kungs
vs mann ẜatziyis gir/ Tu eſẜi mans Dähls/ ẜchodeen äßmu es töw
dſimmis.
8. Praſẜi no mann/ tad ghribbu es töw tohß Pagganus par
Bährnamantu doht/ vnd tahs Paſẜaules ghallus par ihſtänu paſſchu
Manntu.
9. Töw buhß tohß ar dſällſa Riext ẜaſẜiſt/ ka Pohdus buhß töw
tohß ẜadauſiet.
10. Tad leezeetees nu raditees juhß Koninyi/ vnnd leezeetees
mahzitees juhß Ꞩohgi wirſẜon Semmes.
11. Kallpoyeeta tam Kungam bydammees/ vnd preezayeetees
trieſẜädammi.
12. Skuhpſtaita to Dählu/ ka tas nhe dußmo/ vnd juhs ẜamaitaht
vs to zeļļu/ Aiſto winja Dußmiba peepehſch ee=dexees/ bett
labb wiſẜeem/ kattri vs to zerreh.
Ghods gir tam Thäwam/ vnd tam Dählam/ vnd tam Ꞩwähtam
Pſalmen Dawids. 179
Gharram/ Ka no Eeſakumu gir biyis/ vnd palleek muhſcho
muhſcham/ Amen/
Der dritte Pſalm.
Weena Dſeeßma Dawida/ kad wings behdſe preekſchan ſawu
Dählu Abſolon.
OCk Kungs/ ka gir mann tick dauds Enaideneeki/ vnd ſtahw
tick dauds prettie mann.
2. Dauds ẜacka no mannas Dwehſẜeles/ tai nhe gir nhe
kahds Palliegs py Deewu/
Sela.
3. Bett tu Kungs eſẜi tee Ällkona=Brunņi preekſchann mann/
vnd kas mann ghoda zeļļ/ vnd mannu Ghallwu vszeļļ.
4. Es peeẜautzo ar mannu Balxni to Kungu/ tad paklauſẜa
Wings mann no ẜawu ẜwähtu Kallnu/
Sela.
5. Es ghullu vnd duſẜu/ vñ vßmohſtohs/ aiſto tas Kungs turr mañ.
6. Es nhe bieſtohs par dauds Ꞩimbt=tuxtoſcheem/ kattri prett
mann apẜähdas.
7. Zellees aukſcham Kungs/ vnd palliedſi mann manns Deews/
aiſto tu ẜweed wiſẜeem manneem Eenaidnekeem vs Waighu/ vnd ẜadauſi
to Beßdeewigo Sohbus.
8. Py to Kungu palliedſiba gir attraſtina/ vnd tawa ẜwehtiba
par taweem Ļaudeem/
Sela.
Ghods gir tam Tähwam/ vnd tam Dählam/ vnd
etc.
Der vierdte Pſalm.
Weena Dſeeßma Dawida/ preekſcha dſeedaht vs Kohklehm.
PACklauſẜi mann/ kad es ẜautzu/ Deews mannas Taißnibas/
katters tu mann eepreezini bähdahs/ eſẜi mann ſchehliegs/ vnd
packlauſẜi mannu Luhkſchanu.
2. Mieļi Kunghi/ zeek illghe buhß mannai ghodai nitzinatai
tapt? Ka mieļoyeeta juhß tohs niekſchkus tick lohte/ vnnd tohs
Mälus tick labpraht?
Sela.
3. Atſieſteeta tock ka tas Kungs ẜawus Ꞩwähtus briniſke wadda/
taß Kungs dſirrd/ kad es to peeẜautzu.
180 Pſalmen Dawids.
4. Dußmoyeeta juhs tad nhe ghräkoyeeta/ Runnayeeta ar juhſẜeem
Ꞩirrdeem vs juhſẜu Ghulltu/ vnd ghaideeta/
Seela
5. Vppereyeeta Taißnibu/ vnd zerreta vs to Kunghu.
6. Dauds ẜacka/ ka warrätu mums ſchiß rahdiet kas labb gir?
Bett Kungs pazell par mums to Ghaißmu tawa Waigha.
7. Tu eepreezini mannu Ꞩirrdi/ Jebſche winjeem ghann dauds
Wiena vnd Labbibas gir.
8. Es ghullu vnd duſſu itt ar meeru/ Aiſto tu Kungs weens palliedſi
mann/ ka es beß bailes dſiewo.
Ghods gir tam Tähwam/ vnd tam Dählam/ vnd
etc.
Der 25. Pſalm.
Weena Dſeeßma Dawida.
PEhtz töw Kungs illgoyas mann/ Mans Deews es zeŗŗu vs
töw/ Nhe laid mann kaunà tapt/ ka manni Eenaidneeki par
mann nhe preezayahs.
2. Aiſto nhe weens tohp kaunà kas töwis ghaida/ bett kaunà
buhs teem tapt/ tee nickni Neewatayi. (
vel
Nitzinatayi.)
3. Kungs rahdi man tawu zeļļu/ vnd mahzi man tawas Pähdas.
4. Waddi mann eekſchan tawas Teeſẜibas/ vnd mahzi mann/
Aiſto tu eſẜi tas Deews katters mann pallieds/ Jckdenas es töw
ghaidu.
5. Attmini Kungs tawas Schälaſtibas vnd tawas Lehnibas/
kattra no Paſẜaules Eeẜakummu biyuſẜi gir.
6. Nhe peeminn tohs ghräkus mannas Jaunibas vnd mannu
Pahrkahpſchanu/ Bett peeminn mannis pehtz tawas Schälaſtibas/
tawas lehnibas dehļ.
7. Tas Kungs gir labbs vnd rahms/ tapehtz pamahza tas tohs
Ghrehzeneekus vs to zeļļu.
8. Tas wadda tohß Nabbagus pareiſe/ vnd mahza teem Nabbageem
ẜawu zeļļu.
9. Tee Zeļļi ta Kunga gir Schälaſtiba ween vnd Teeſẜiba/
Teems kattri winya Ꞩaliedſenaſchanu vnd Leezibu turr.
Pſalmen Davids. 181
10. Tawa Wahrda dehl Kungs eſẜi ſchehliegs mannai Noſeedſibai/
kattra leela gir.
11. Kas gir tas/ kas to Kunghu byſtahs? Wings tam mahzies
to labbaku Zeļļu.
12. Winya Dwehſẜele labbumà dſiewohs/ vnd winja Sähkla
to Semm apſehdehs.
13. Ta Apẜlehpſchana tha Kunga gir ſtarpan teem kattri to
bieſtahs/ vnd ẜawu ẜaliedſenaſchanu leek wings teem ſinnaht.
14. Mannas Atzis ſkattahs allaſchien vs to Kunghu/ Aiſto
Wings mannu Kayu aran to Tieklu ißwillx.
15. Ghreſees py mann/ vnd eſẜi mann ſchähliegs/ Aiſto es äßmu
itt weens vnd nabbags.
16. Ta ißbaile mannas Ꞩirrds gir leela/ wedd mann aran mannahm
mohkam.
17. Vßraugi mannas bähdas vnd Nabbadſibu/ vnd peedohd
mann wiſẜus mannus Ghräkus.
18. Redſi ka mann tick dauds Eenaidneeki gir/ vnd ee=nied mañ
no nicknas Ꞩirrds.
19. Paſẜargi mannu Dwehſẜel vnd attpeſti mann/ Nhe leetz
mann kaunà tapt/ aiſto es zeŗŗu vs töw.
20. Weenteeſẜiba vnd Taißniba ta laid mann paſẜarga/ Aiſto
es ghaidu töwis.
21. Deews ißpeſti Jſraël/ aran wiſẜahm winja bähdam.
Ghods gir tam Tähwam/ vnd tam Dählam/ vnd
etc.
Der 110. Pſalm.
Weena Dſeeßma Dawida.
TAs Kungs ẜatziya vs mannu Kunghu/ ẜehdees py mannu labbu
Rohku/ teekams es tawus Eenaidneekus par Pammäßlu
taweem Kahyeem leeku.
2. Tas Kungs ẜuhties to Riext tawas Wallſtibas aran Zion/
Walldi ſtarrpan taweem Eenaidneekeem.
3. Pehtz tawu Vßwarreſchanu tawi Ļaudis töw labpraht vpperehs
182 Pſalmen Davids.
ẜwähtà Krahßnibà/ Tawi Bährni tohp töw peedſimbti/ ka
ta Raſẜa no to Rietas=ẜarrkanumu.
4. Tas Kungs gir ſwehrehyis vnd tas tam nhe buhs ſchähl/ Tu
eſẜi weens Baſnizaskungs muhſchige/ pehtz to wies Melchiſedek.
5. Tas Kungs py tawu labbu Rohku/ ẜadauſẜies tohs Koningjus
ẜawas dußmibas laikà.
6. Tas ſohdies ſtarrpan teem Paggaņeem/ Tas leelus Kaŗŗus
turrehs/ Tas ẜadauſies to Ghallwu par leelahm Semmehm.
7. Tas dſerrs no Vppes vs Zeļļu/ tapehtz tas to Ghallwu aukſcham
zells.
Ghods gir tam Tähwam/ vnd tam Dählam/ vnd
etc.
Der 111. Pſalm.
Halleluja.
ES patteitzu tam Kungham no wiſẜas Ꞩirrds/ Eekſchan to
Runnu tho labbo vnd eekſchan tahs Draudſibas.
2. Leeli gir tee Darrbi tha Kunga/ kas tohs zeeni/ tam
gir Patiekſchana ween py teem.
3. Ko tas darra/ tas gir ẜlawäns vnd ghodäns/ vnnd winja
Taißniba palleek muhſchige.
4. Tas gir weenu Peeminneſchanu ee=ſtadiyis ẜawo Brienumo/
tas lehniegs vnd ſchehliegs Deews.
5. Tas dohd Barribu teems kattri to bieſtahs/ tas attminn
muhſchige ſawas ẜaliedſenaſchannas.
6. Tas leek paẜluddenaht ẜawus warränuswärranus Darrbus ẜaweem
Ļaudeem/ ka tas teem dohtu to Manntu to Paggaņo Ļauſcho.
7. Tee Darrbi ẜawas Rokas gir Taißniba vnd Teeſẜa/ Wiſẜi
winja Baußli gir pareiſi.
8. Tee tohp vßturrähti allaſch vnd muhſchige/ vnd noteek ißtitzige
vnd ghodige.
9. Tas ẜuhta ẜawu Attpeſtiſchanu ẜaweem Ļaudeem/ Tas ẜohla/
ka winja Ꞩaliedſenaſchanai muhſchige pallickt buhs.
10. Swähtz vñ ghodiegs gir winja Wahrds/ ta Biyaſchana/ tha
Kunga gir tahs Ghuddribas eeẜakums.
Pſalmen Davids. 183
11. Ta gir weena krahßna Ghuddriba/ kas pehtz to darra/ tha
Ꞩlawa palleek muhſchige.
Ghods gir tam Tähwam/ vnd tam Dählam/ vnd
etc.
Der 112. Pſalm.
Halleluja.
LAbb tam/ katters to Kungu bieſtahs/ kattram leela pattickſchana
gir py winja Baußleem.
2. Tha Ꞩähklai buhs warrähnai buht wirs Semmes/
tas Radds to Labbo buhs ẜwehtietz.
3. Baggatiba vnd Pillniba buhs wiņja Nammohs/ vnd winja
Taißniba palleek muhſchige.
4. Teem labbeem vslätz ta Ghaißma eekſchan Tumbſibas/ no
to laipnu/ ſchehligu vnd taißnu.
5. Labb tam kas ſchehliegs gir/ vnd labpraht aißdohd/ vnd ißtaiſẜa
ẜawas leetas/ ka tas nhe weenam nhe=pareiſe darra.
6. Aiſto tas muhſchige pallix/ tas Taißnis muhſchige nhe tohp
aißmirrſts.
7. Kad kahda ļaunu leeta nahkt ghribb/ tad tas nhe bieſtahs/
winja Ꞩirrds zerre nhe biedammees vs to Kungu.
8. Winja Ꞩirrds gir drohſcha/ vnd nhe bieſtahs/ Teekams tas
ẜawu Preeku py ẜaweem Eenaidnekeem räds.
9. Wings ißbahrſta vnd dohd teem Nabbageem/ winja Taißniba
palleek muhſchige/ winja Raggs tohp pa=auxtenahtz ar Ghodu.
10. Tas Beßdeewiegs redſehs to/ vnd tas tam ẜahpehs/ ẜawus
Sobus tas ẜakohdies vnd ißniex/ Aiſto ko tee Beßdeewigi labpraht
ghribbätu tas gir wellte.
Ghods gir tam Tähwam/ vnd tam Dählam/ vnd
etc.
Der 113. Pſalm.
Halleluja.
SLaweeyeeta juhs Kallpi to Kungu/ ẜlaweyeeta to Wahrdu
ta Kunga.
2. Ꞩlawähtz laid buht tha Kunga Wahrds/ no ẜcho laiku
wiſſà muhſchà.
184 Pſalmen Davids.
3. No Ꞩaules Vslehkſchanu lieds winjas Noeeſchanu/ laid
ẜlawähtam buht tha Kunga Wahrdam.
4. Tas Kungs gir auxtz par wiſẜeem Paggaņeem/ Winja Ghohds
ſteepyahs kamähr tas Debbeſẜis gir.
5. Kas gir ka tas Kungs muhſẜo Deews? katters tick auxte ẜehdeyees
gir.
6. Vnd vs to Säm̃oſchu ſkattahs/ eekſchan Debbeſſu vnd Sem̃es.
7. Katters to Wahyu vszeļļ no teems Pieſchleems/ vnd paauxtena
tohs Nabbagus no teem dubbļeem.
8. Ka tas to ẜädenatu py teem leeleem Kungheem/ py teem leeleem
Kungheem ẜawo Ļauſcho.
9. Katters to Nheaugligu Nammà dſiewoht darra/ ka ta weena
preeziga Bährno=mahte tohp/ Halleluja.
Ghods gir tam Tähwam/ vnd tam Dählam/ vnd
etc.
Der 114. Pſalm.
KAd Jſraels no Eegyptes ißghaya/ ta zillta Jäcoba no teem
ẜweſſcheem Ļaudeem.
2. Tad tappa Juda winja Ꞩwähtums/ Jſraels winjam
paklauſẜiegs.
3. Ta Juhre redſeya vnd bägha/ tas Jordans ghreeſehs ẜöw
attpackaļļ.
4. Tee Kallni laxtiya ka te Jehringji/ tee Zällmi ka tahs jaunas
Awis.
5. Kas by töw tu Juhre/ ka tu behzi? Vnd tu Jordan/ ka tu
attpackaļļ ghreeſehs.
6. Juhs Kallni/ ka juhs laxtiyeeta ka te Jehringji? Juhs Zällmi/
ka tahs jaunas Awis?
7. Preekſchan to Kunghu trieſẜeya ta Semme/ preekſchan to
Deewu Jacob.
8. Katters tohs Ackmina kallnus pahrwehre par Vdensäſäru/
vnd tohs Ackmiņus par Vdens=Ackahm.
Vier Octonarien auß dem 119. Pſalm.
Pſalmen Davids. 185
LAbb teem kattri nhenoſeedſige dſiewo/ kattri eekſchan to
Baußlu tha Kunga ſtaigha.
2. Labb teem kattri winja Leezibu turr/ kattri winju no
wiſẜas Ꞩirrds meckle.
3. Aiſto kattri vs winja Zeļļeem ſtaigha/ tee nhe darra nhe neeka
ļaun.
4. Tu eſẜi pawehleyis Ꞩirrdige turreht/ tawus Pawehleſchanus.
5. O kaut maña dſiewiba tawas TaißnibasTaßnibas ar wiſẜu Ꞩirrdi turrätu.
6. Kad es ſkattohs ween vs taweem Baußleem/ tad nhe tohpu
es kaunà.
7. Es patteitzu töw no wiſẜas Ꞩirrds/ ka tu mann mahzi to taiſnibu
tawas Teeſẜas.
8. Tawus Taiſnibus ghribbu es turräht/ Nhe attſtah mann
muhſchige.
Ghods gir tam Tähwam/ vnd tam Dählam/ vnd tam ſwähtam
Gharram/ Ka no Eeẜakumu gir biyis/ vnd palleek muhſcho
muhſcham/ Amen.
KA weens Jauneeklis ẜawu zeļļu pareiſe ſtaighahs? Kad tas
ẜöw turrahs pehtz tawu Wahrdu.
10. Es meckleyo töw no wiſẜas Ꞩirrds/ Nhe leetz mann
alloht no tawu Baußlu.
11. Es patturru tawu Wahrdu mannà Ꞩirrdy/ ka es prettieb
töw nhe Ghräkoyo.
12. Ꞩlawähtz eſẜi tu Kungs/ Mahzi mann tawas Teeſẜas.
13. Es ghribbu ar mannahm Luhpahm ſtahſtiet/ wiſẜas Taiſnibas
tawas Muttes.
14. Es preezayohs par to Zeļļu tawas leezibas/ ka par wiſẜenadu
Baggatibu.
15. Es runnayo ko tu pawehleyis eſẜi/ vnd ſkatto vs taweem
Zeļļeem.
16. Mann ghribbahs tawas Taißnibas/ vnd es nhe aismirrſto
tawu Wahrdu.
Ghods gir tam Tähwam/ vnd tam Dählam/ vnd
etc.
186 Pſalmen Davids.
DArri labb tawam Kallpam/ ka es dſiewoyo vnd tawu Wahrdu
turro.
18. Attdarri mannas Atzis/ ka es rädſo tohs brienumus
py tawu Baußlu.
19. Es äßmu Weeſẜis vs Semmes/ Nhe paẜlepp tawu Baußlu
preekſchan mann.
20. Manna Dwehſẜele gir ẜaghrauſieta no illghoſchanas/ Pehtz
tawas Taißnibas allaſchien.
21. Tu lam̃a tohs Läppnus/ Nolahdäti gir kattri no taweems
Baußleems alloyahs.
22. Ghrees no mann Kaunu vnd Nitzinaſchanu/ Aiſto es turru
tawu Leezibu.
23. Jrr tee leeli Kungi ẜehſch vnd runna prettie mann/ Bett
taws Kallps runna no tawu Taißnibu.
24. Mann ghribbahs tawas Taißnibas/ Tee gir manni Rahtes=
Kungi. Ghods gir tam Tähwam/ vnd
etc.
25. MAnna Dwehſẜele ghull eekſchan Pieſchļeem/ Eepreezini
mann pehtz tawu Wahrdu.
26. Es ſtahſtu mannu Zeļļus/ vnd tu paklauſẜi mann/
Mahzi mann tawas Taißnibas.
27. Pamahzi mann to Zeļļu tawo Baußlo/ tad ghribbu es runnaht
no taweemtaweeem Brienummem.
28. Es bähdoyohs/ ka mann ta Ꞩirrds nokalſt/ Eeſtipprini
mann pehtz tawu Wahrdu.
29. Noghrees no mann to nhetaißnu Zeļļu/ vnd wehl mann
tawu Baußlu.
30. Es äßmu to Zeļļu tahs Taißnibas ißwehleyees/ tawu Teeſẜu
äßmu es preekſch ẜöw litzees.
31. Es kaŗŗu py taweem Leezibeem/ Kungs nhe ļaw mann
kaunà tapt.
32. Kad tu mannu Ꞩirrdi eeprezini/ tad täcku es to Zeļļu
tawo Baußlo.
Ghods gir tam Tähwam/ vnd tam Dählam/ vnd
etc.
Pſalmen Davids. 187
Das 12. Capitel des Propheten Eſaiae.
Jch dancke dir HErr/ daß du zornig biſt geweſen über
etc.
ES patteitzu töw Kungs/ ka tu Dußmiegs eſẜi vs mann biyis/
vnd tawa dußmiba attghreeſuſẜees gir/ vnd eeprezini mann.
2. Redſi/ Deews gir mans Peſtitais/ es äßmu ar meeru/
vnd nhe bieſtohs/ Aiſto Deews tas Kungs gir manns Spähx/ vnd
manna Dſeeßma/ vnd gir manns Peſtitais.
3. Juhß eeẜeeta preezadammes Vhdeni ſmellt/ no teem Awoteem
tahs Peſtiſchanas.
4. Vnd ẜatzieſẜeeta tanny laikà/ Patteitzeeta tam Kungam/ ißẜautzeeta
winja Wahrdu/ Darrait ſinnamu ſtarrpan teem Ļaudeem
winja Darrbu/ paẜluddenayeeta ka winja Wahrds tick auxtz gir.
5. Dſeedaita tam Kungam/ aiſto Wings gir ẜöw kraßne paradiyees/
to buhs ſinnaht wiſẜahm Semmehm.
6. Liexmo vnd teitz tu Dſiewotaya eekſchan Zion/ Aiſto tas
Ꞩwähtz Jſraël gir leels py töw.
Ghods gir tam Tähwam/ vnd tam Dählam/ vnd tam Ꞩwähtam
Gharram/ ka no Eeẜakumu gir biyis/ vnd palleek muhſcho muhſcham/
Amen.
